data.name: Rooted
data.detailed_description:
Explore the Post-apocalyptic Open World

Rooted is a post-apocalyptic survival game. It’s 2100. You are one of the few survivors. You must progress and adapt through the ruins of the past civilization that collapsed due to global bacteriological warfare.

Over the years, nature has somehow managed to make some areas safe, even taking back terrain and cleaning residue of the devastating bacterial weapons. Urban areas however are less fortunate. You will get in trouble if you go there without protection. You have been warned!

To develop your camp and improve your living conditions, you must explore - alone or with your friends, to collect scraps and objects, restore items, or even create new ones that you will learn to craft along the way.
Watch your surroundings. It won’t be easy, as the danger has many faces.

Solo and Co-op

Alone or with your friends, live an unprecedented post-apocalyptic survival experience that scales to the number of players. Craft your gear, establish tactics, and make your expedition a success, together!

Build and craft and salvage

Build, expand, and upgrade your camp and bases. In Rooted, take the discoveries you make while exploring to your advantage. Craft to make your life easier. Some items will allow you to go further into your exploration: you may be able to reach hidden and dangerous places! The map is yours to explore.

This world still has many things to offer. Items recovery and repair are at the heart of Rooted. The crafting system is the key to both survival and success.

Enemies

You are not alone. Animals can be as helpful as dangerous. You will meet other humans too, who also try to make their way to a better life. Some foes may be stronger than you think. Made of steel or made of flesh, choose your opponent wisely!

Constant evolution

Rooted is a living world. The player’s experience evolves constantly, even after hundreds of hours. You gain access to new areas, new items, and new crafting options over time. Major events and key events will have an impact on the world, bringing new challenges to you and your friends. You must be prepared!


We share our progress

Join us on Discord! We share our progress on a weekly basis. We also take to time to discuss with you, to listen up to your ideas and suggestions. Join us now!
https://discord.gg/rootedthegame

Get notified of the Kickstarter Campaign!

The Kickstarter step is important for us as it is a way to keep our independence in the creation process. We need this freedom. For us, this is the best way to build the foundations of Rooted.

Sign up for updates about the Kickstarter here!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/49947725/rooted-0
The campaign will start in a few weeks.

data.short_description: In this multiplayer survival game, explore an ancient, rooted world full of dangers. Craft, hunt, build and try to survive alone or with your friends in an evolving and fascinating environment. Powered by Unreal Engine 5.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
